movie_title: The Most Awkward “Undercover Boss” Ever - Key & Peele
introduction: This episode of “Undercover Boss” gets awkward when a man finds out the new employee he’s been bully

quiz.question: What did Don reveal to his employees in the warehouse?
choices: He is the president of the company
He is a TV show host
quiz.answer: He is the president of the company
quiz.explanation: Don revealed to his employees that he is actually the president of the company, not a new employee as they thought.

quiz.question: What did Don promise to Bill?
choices: A college fund for his boys
quiz.explanation: Don promised to get Bill a new Ford Explorer because his car had broken down and was not working right.

quiz.question: What inappropriate topic did Joseph keep bringing up?
quiz.explanation: Joseph repeatedly brought up inappropriate topics related to his body parts, making the situation uncomfortable and disrespectful.
